duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing a variety of services as a member of a patient care team to meet the health care, safety, and comfort needs of patients.
Performing activities in accordance with all existing regulatory and hospital standards, policies, and procedures.
Assisting Registered Nurses in patient care activities.
Reporting to the Unit Manager for guidance and supervision.
Gaining competencies in specialty patient care populations including heart transplant patients, Ventricular Assist Device patients, and TAVR population.

education_certification.credential: CPR validation within 3 months of hire
